name: Layered Pizza Dip
description: This is truly a summer lovin’ type of appy. It’s cool, creamy, and loaded with pizza flavour. Make it your own by topping with your favourite pizza fixings, like roasted red peppers, cooked meat, or (dare I say it?) pineapple! Use a low, wide bowl so it’s easy to dip through all the layers.
preparation:
1. In a bowl, combine hot dip mix, yogurt, and cream cheese. Spread dip in a large bowl or dish that will hold at least 5 cups. 
  2. Using a spoon, dollop marinara sauce overtop, then spread out to the edges.  
  3. Dice bell pepper and onion. Place on top of marinara, then sprinkle on cheese. Add additional toppings, if desired.  
  4. Serve with sliced veggies, tortilla chips, or crackers for dipping.
tips: Swap 2 tbsp Pizza Seasoning for Pizza Dip Hot Dip Mix.
